name: Uncontrol (Abhi_mehta)
description:
Technology is Unstoppable.

Technology is Inevitable.

Fight the flow of time.

Take back control.

Controls: WASD

This game was created for Trijam 106 Theme: Unstoppable Technology.

All Assets including 3D models, scripts, etc. were created by Abhi_Mehta

Music : Royalty free (technica)

Note: The game has three levels

Please Play in Full-Screen Mode (1920x1080) to play as intended
